external_games.name: Train Simulator: Grand Central Class 180 'Adelante' DMU Add-On

name: Train Simulator 2021: Grand Central Class 180 'Adelante' DMU
summary: The iconic Class 180 'Adelante' speeds into Train Simulator 2021 in distinctive Grand Central Trains livery. The five-car sets were built by Alstom at their Washwood Heath plant between 2000 and 2001 for First Great Western, who wanted to increase the frequency of their express services between London Paddington and South Wales.
